alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:21PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Phelps, Kearney and southeastern Buffalo Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1020 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Funk, or 8 miles northeast of Holdrege, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Axtell around 1025 PM CDT. Kearney around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gibbon. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 263 and 291. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Nebraska.
